visual.name: smallMultipleLineChart
visual.description: Provides the ability to plot a line chart with small multiples.

en-US.Landing_Page_Overview: Thanks very much for using this visual! For basic usage, you will need to add the following fields to the visual (more detailed help can be obtained by clicking the question mark icon in the top-right of this page):
en-US.Landing_Page_Overview_Field_1: Small Multiple - field to partition your data, or chart by, based on its unique values. If supplying more than one field, you can drill/expand.
en-US.Landing_Page_Overview_Field_2: Axis - field to plot on the X-axis of your chart.
en-US.Landing_Page_Overview_Field_3: Values - measures to plot on your charts.
en-US.Roles_SmallMultiple_Description: Small multiples will be generated for all unique values of this field.
en-US.Roles_Axis_Description: Categorical or x-axis value to use for charts.
en-US.Roles_Values_Description: Measure or y-axis value(s) to use for charts.
en-US.Roles_Tooltips_Description: Add additional data fields that people can see in the tooltip when they hover on part of the visualization.
en-US.Objects_Layout_Description: Control layout aspects of the small multiples grid.
en-US.Objects_Layout_HorizontalGrid_Descriptio: Specify column sizing behavior for the small multiples layout
en-US.Objects_Layout_VerticalGrid_Description: Specify row sizing behavior for the small multiples layout
en-US.Objects_Layout_MultipleHeight_Descriptio: The height of each small multiple, in pixels.
en-US.Objects_Layout_MultipleWidth_Description: The width of each small multiple, in pixels.
en-US.Objects_Layout_Columns_Description: The maximum number of columns to have in each row.
en-US.Objects_Heading_Description: Specify whether to display the field value as a heading for each small multiple, as well as configuring its font and position.
en-US.Objects_Heading_Position_Description: Where to place the heading within each small multiple.
en-US.Objects_Heading_FontColour_Description: Color for the small multiple heading font.
en-US.Objects_Heading_FontColourAlternate_Desc: Color to apply to each small multiple heading, if applying an alternate backgound color (available in the Small Multiples Styling menu).
en-US.Objects_Heading_FontSize_Description: Size of the text used for each small multiple heading.
en-US.Objects_Heading_FontFamily_Description: The font to use for each small multiple heading.
en-US.Objects_SmallMultiple_Description: Additional styling options for small multiples, including backgrounds and border.
en-US.Objects_SmallMultiple_BackgroundColor_De: Background color to apply to each small multiple.
en-US.Objects_SmallMultiple_BackgroundTranspar: Amount of transparency to apply to each small multiple background.
en-US.Objects_SmallMultiple_ZebraStripe_Descri: Apply an alternating background color to small multiples.
en-US.Objects_SmallMultiple_ZebraStripeApply_D: Specify how to apply the alternate background color. This can be by column, by row, or alternating across all small multiples.
en-US.Objects_SmallMultiple_BackgroundColorAlt: Alternate background color to apply, using the Color By rules.
en-US.Objects_SmallMultiple_BorderColor_Descri: Color to apply to each small multiple border.
en-US.Objects_SmallMultiple_BorderStrokeWidth_: Width of each small multiple border.
en-US.Objects_SmallMultiple_BorderStyle_Descri: Line style to apply to each small multiple border.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_ShowLabels_Description: Show/hide the X-axis labels. Note that if the visual is too small, the labels may be automatically removed to maximise available space.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_ShowTitle_Description: Show/hide the X-axis title. Note that if the visual is too small, the title may be automatically removed to maximise available space.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_TitleColor_Description: Color to apply to the X-axis title font.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_TitleText_Description: Text to apply to the X-axis title. If left unfilled, this will be the field name.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_TitleFontSize_Description: Size of the text used for the X-axis title.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_TitleFontFamily_Descriptio: The font to use for the X-axis title.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_AxisLineColor_Description: Color to apply to the X-axis domain line.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_AxisLineStrokeWidth_Descri: Width of the X-axis domain line.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_FontColor_Description: Color to apply to X-axis labels.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_FontSize_Description: Size of the text used for the X-axis labels.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_FontFamily_Description: The font to use for the X-axis labels.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_Gridlines_Description: Show or hide the X-axis gridlines.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_GridlineColor_Description: Color to apply to the X-axis gridlines.
en-US.Objects_XAxis_GridlineStrokeLineStyle_De: Style to apply to the X-axis gridlines.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_ShowLabels_Description: Show/hide the Y-axis labels. Note that if the visual is too small, the labels may be automatically removed to maximise available space.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_ShowTitle_Description: Show/hide the Y-axis title. Note that if the visual is too small, the title may be automatically removed to maximise available space.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_TitleStyle_Description: Specify whether to display the prescribed title, or append measure details (or just measure details).
en-US.Objects_YAxis_TitleColor_Description: Color to apply to the Y-axis title font.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_TitleText_Description: Text to apply to the Y-axis title. If left unfilled, this will be the field name.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_TitleFontSize_Description: Size of the text used for the Y-axis title.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_TitleFontFamily_Descriptio: The font to use for the Y-axis title.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_FontColor_Description: Color to apply to Y-axis labels.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_FontSize_Description: Size of the text used for the Y-axis labels.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_FontFamily_Description: The font to use for the Y-axis labels.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_Gridlines_Description: Show or hide the Y-axis gridlines.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_GridlineColor_Description: Color to apply to the Y-axis gridlines.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_GridlineStrokeLineStyle_De: Style to apply to the Y-axis gridlines.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_Start_Description: Value to start the Y-axis at.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_End_Description: Value to end the Y-axis at.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_LabelDisplayUnits_Descript: Specify whether to display the Y-axis label in specific units.
en-US.Objects_YAxis_Precision_Description: Specify the number of decimal places to use for values in the Y-axis labels.
en-US.Objects_Lines_Description: Configure the appearance of the lines used for measures in the visual.
en-US.Objects_Lines_LineShape_Description: The shape of the line - linear/curved etc.
en-US.Objects_Lines_LineStyle_Description: The style to apply to the line.
en-US.Objects_Lines_ShowArea_Description: Show an area with the line.
en-US.Objects_Lines_Transparency_Description: The amount of transparency to apply to the area.
en-US.Objects_Lines_ByMeasure_Description: Specifies whether to apply line styling for each measure invididually, or combined.
en-US.Objects_ColorSelector_Description: Apply colouring to measures in the visual.
en-US.Objects_Legend_Position_Description: Select the location for the legend.
en-US.Objects_Legend_TitleText_Description: Specify a manual label for the legend title.
en-US.Objects_Legend_IncludeRanges_Description: Include the min/max values of the X-axis in the legend title.
en-US.Objects_Legend_FontColor_Description: The color of the font to use in the legend.
en-US.Objects_Legend_FontSize_Description: Size of text used for the legend.
en-US.Objects_DataLabels_Description: Show or hide data labels for measures.
